dosageInstruction.text: Take 0.5 mg by nebulization daily., Until Discontinued, Historical Med
Take 100 mg by mouth 1 (one) time each day., Historical Med

dosageInstruction.text: Take 0.25 mg by mouth nightly as needed., Until Discontinued, Historical Med
dosageInstruction.patientInstruction: Take 0.25 mg by mouth nightly as needed.

dosageInstruction.text: Take 7.5 mg by mouth 2 (two) times a day., Historical Med

dosageInstruction.text: Take 6 mg by mouth 1 (one) time each day. , Historical Med

dosageInstruction.text: Take 40 mg by mouth daily., Until Discontinued, Historical Med
